parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Camera Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates [[Post process effects]] specified by effect name and priority. Supported effects are:<br>

* [[Post_process_effects#RadialBlur|"RadialBlur"]]
* [[Post_process_effects#ChromAberration|"ChromAberration"]]
* [[Post_process_effects#WetDistortion|"WetDistortion"]]
* [[Post_process_effects#ColorCorrections|"ColorCorrections"]]
* [[Post_process_effects#DynamicBlur|"DynamicBlur"]]
* [[Post_process_effects#FilmGrain|"FilmGrain"]]
* [[Post_process_effects#ColorInversion|"ColorInversion"]]

</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ppEffectCreate''' [name, priority] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [name, priority]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> name: [[String]] - name of effect type.  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> priority: [[Number]] - unique priority, defines order of applying effect to the scene. If there is another effect using the same priority, creation will fail. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - handle or -1 if failed </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> '''ppEffectCreate''' [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[name1, priority1],...] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [name1, priority1]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> name: [[String]] - name of effect type.  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> priority: [[Number]] - unique priority, defines order of applying effect to the scene. If there is another effect using the same priority, creation will fail.</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[Number]]s [handle1, ...] or [[Nothing]] if failed </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ppGrain = [[ppEffectCreate]] ["filmGrain", 2005];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Post process effects]], [[ppEffectForceInNVG]], [[ppEffectEnable]], [[ppEffectEnabled]], [[ppEffectDestroy]], [[ppEffectCommit]], [[ppEffectCommitted]], [[ppEffectAdjust]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
